DescriptionInternal__c: This is your main home that you live in most of the time
Name: Primary Residential

DescriptionInternal__c: This is any other property that you often live in
Name: Additional Residential

DescriptionInternal__c: Any property which you own with the intention to make money with. Maybe you rent it out to others, or maybe you are holding it while it appreciates.
Name: Buy to let/Investment

DescriptionInternal__c: A property which you stay in for a small amount of time per year. You may or may not rent it out to others for the rest of the time
Name: Holiday home

DescriptionInternal__c: A collection of properties you own, all of which are commercial properties. If you have these, you'll know.
Name: Portfolio - Commercial

DescriptionInternal__c: A collection of properties that you own, of any type except commercial
Name: Portfolio - non commercial

DescriptionInternal__c: Any land that you own, for example farmland, forestry or undeveloped plots
Name: Agricultural & Land

DescriptionInternal__c: A property used for commercial purposes. If you have this, you'll know.
Name: Commercial

DescriptionInternal__c: A privately owned company of which you own some or all of the shares
Name: Private limited company

DescriptionInternal__c: A limited liability partnership which you are a member of with an entitlement to some or all of the profits. If you have this, you'll know/
Name: Limited liability partnership

DescriptionInternal__c: Non-physical assets. If you have one of these, you'll know.
Name: Intellectual property, patent or licensing rights

DescriptionInternal__c: Any car that you own, whether for day to day use or a classic sports car.
Name: Car

DescriptionInternal__c: Any motorcycle that you own, whether for day to day use or a classic sports car.
Name: Motorcycle

DescriptionInternal__c: Any bicycle you own with significant value.
Name: Bicycle

DescriptionInternal__c: Any caravan that you own.
Name: Caravan

DescriptionInternal__c: Any boat that you own.
Name: Boat

DescriptionInternal__c: Any plane that you own.
Name: Plane

DescriptionInternal__c: Any horsebox that you own with significant value.
Name: Horsebox

DescriptionInternal__c: Any art that you own with significant value.
Name: Art

DescriptionInternal__c: Any gold that you own with significant value.
Name: Gold

DescriptionInternal__c: Any jewellery that you own with significant value.
Name: Jewellery

DescriptionInternal__c: Any watch that you own with significant value.
Name: Watch

DescriptionInternal__c: Any wine that you own with significant value.
Name: Wine

DescriptionInternal__c: Any private collection that you own with significant value.
Name: Collection

DescriptionInternal__c: Any antique that you own with significant value.
Name: Antique

DescriptionInternal__c: Any whiskey that you own with significant value.
Name: Whiskey

DescriptionInternal__c: Any instrument that you own with significant value.
Name: Musical instrument

DescriptionInternal__c: Any tech / gadgets that you own with significant value.
Name: Tech

DescriptionInternal__c: Any other item which has signifcant value.
Name: Other valuable object

DescriptionInternal__c: Any foreign currency which you hold in the UK or abroad.
Name: Foreign Currency

DescriptionInternal__c: Any cryptocurrency which you own.
Name: Cryptocurrency

DescriptionInternal__c: Any crypto assets aside from cryptocurrency, e.g. NFTs
Name: Crypto assets

DescriptionInternal__c: Any loans you have personally made to individuals or businesses of significant value.
Name: Family loan
